mapper.select: select * from history where TO_CHAR(RETURN_DATE , 'yy/mm/dd') = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd') or to_char(loan_date, 'yy/mm/dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd')
mapper.update: update history set loan_status = '반납' , RETURN_DATE = sysdate , RETURN_DELAYDAYS = GREATEST(TRUNC(sysdate - RETURN_DUEDATE),0) where BOOK_NUM=#{book_Num}
